title: Firefox Page Loading Issue While Researching Dubai Real Estate
content:
I’ve recently been browsing various real estate portals in Dubai, and I noticed that some pages take unusually long to load in Firefox compared to other browsers. I’m trying to explore different communities such as <a href=https://dubaiislandproperties.com/>Dubai 

Island Properties</a>, but the slowdown affects the user experience.

title: Bookmarks
content: Hello. I'm having trouble with my Bookmarks Menu. All it shows is my recent Bookmarks. When I click on manage bookmarks. It shows the folders that are supposed to be in the Bookmarks Menu. And I can see the Bookmarks I have added to those folders. But none of it shows up in the Bookmarks tab in my Firefox browser menu. It just says recent bookmarks at the top. And of course shows my recent Bookmarks. Any suggestions on how I can get it to show my folders?

title: missing bookmarks
content: The bookmarks and history system will not be functional because one of Firefox's files is in use by another application. Some security software can cause this problem.

title: STILL CANNOT LOG INTO MY BANK!!!!!!!!
content:
For MONTHS now I have been unable to log into my BANK & ONLY my BANK.

EVERY TIME I try to log in I keep getting booted to the DAM "secure sign up" page! 

Each month I have to get ANOTHER "temporary" passwords so I can get to my account & the next month I CAN'T LOG IN AGAIN & AGAIN I have to go through the entire routine again, temporary password, make up another new password over & over again!!!!!!!!!!

I am sick & very tired of this, I only have problems with my BANK log in, no other site, just MY BANK! I suspect the problem is with FIREFOX not the bank. I don't want to use "Edge" because it's CRAP!
